title: Innovative Instructional Design Strategies Utilizing Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Strengthening educational design capabilities in social contexts for professionals (medical/legal/technical fields)

learning_goals: Derive at least three practical strategies for applying generative AIâ€™s core functions to the instructional design process.

Learners select 3 ethical/legal issues (copyright, data security, algorithmic bias, etc.) that may arise when using AI tools and write a 5-page report proposing countermeasures for each, including legal standards (citing 1+ relevant laws) and technical solutions (2+ suggestions)
